headline.main: Federal Drug Agency Plans a 3-Phase Drive to Curb the Misuse of 'Pep Pills'

byline.original: By HAROLD M. SCHMECK Jr. Special to The New York Times

docs.abstract: FDA is planning major changes in labeling and other actions to help bring abuse of amphetamines under control; action includes major changes in labeling that mfrs can put on products, restricting allowable med claims and strengthening description of potential dangers, efforts to draw attention of physicians to labeling changes and to potential dangers of drug and initiation of new studies of amphetamines' med usefulness and drawbacks
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 2 The Food and Drug Administration is planning major changes in labeling and other actions to help bring abuse of amphetamines under control.
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 2 The Food and Drug Administration is planning major changes in labeling and other actions to help bring abuse of amphetamines under control.
